languages.text: "Духи говорят мне иное. Я раскинул руны, и они сказали мне идти на звук Зловещего воя. Каждый из нас несет бремя сплетенной для него судьбы, и моя сейчас обвилась вокруг горла, душит меня, не разрешая пойти с тобой". {n}Ульфар хмурится, упрямо склонив голову.{/n}

"The spirits tell me otherwise. I cast the runes, and they bade me follow the sound of the Baleful Howl. Each of us bears the burden of the fate woven for him, and mine is now coiled around my throat, choking me, keeping me from going with you." {n}Ulfar frowns, bowing his head stubbornly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Духи говорят мне иное. Я раскинул руны, и они сказали мне идти на звук Зловещего воя. Каждый из нас несет бремя сплетенной для него судьбы, и моя сейчас обвилась вокруг горла, душит меня, не разрешая пойти с тобой". {n}Ульфар хмурится, упрямо склонив голову.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The spirits tell me otherwise. I cast the runes, and they bade me follow the sound of the Baleful Howl. Each of us bears the burden of the fate woven for him, and mine is now coiled around my throat, choking me, keeping me from going with you." {n}Ulfar frowns, bowing his head stubbornly.{/n}

"The spirits tell me otherwise. I cast the runes, and they bade me follow the sound of the Baleful Howl. Each of us bears the burden of the fate woven for him, and mine is now coiled around my throat, choking me, keeping me from going with you." {n}Ulfar frowns, bowing his head stubbornly.{/n}

"The spirits tell me otherwise. I cast the runes, and they bade me follow the sound of the Baleful Howl. Each of us bears the burden of the fate woven for him, and mine is now coiled around my throat, choking me, keeping me from going with you." {n}Ulfar frowns, bowing his head stubbornly.{/n}

languages.text: « Les esprits ne sont pas d'accord là-dessus. J'ai lancé les runes, et ils m'exhortent à suivre la clameur des Hurleurs sanguinaires. Chacun d'entre nous porte le fardeau du destin tracé pour lui, et le mien menace à présent de se resserrer autour de ma gorge tel un nœud coulant si je commets l'erreur de vous accompagner. » {n}Ulfar se renfrogne et baisse la tête d'un air buté.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The spirits tell me otherwise. I cast the runes, and they bade me follow the sound of the Baleful Howl. Each of us bears the burden of the fate woven for him, and mine is now coiled around my throat, choking me, keeping me from going with you." {n}Ulfar frowns, bowing his head stubbornly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les esprits ne sont pas d'accord là-dessus. J'ai lancé les runes, et ils m'exhortent à suivre la clameur des Hurleurs sanguinaires. Chacun d'entre nous porte le fardeau du destin tracé pour lui, et le mien menace à présent de se resserrer autour de ma gorge tel un nœud coulant si je commets l'erreur de vous accompagner. » {n}Ulfar se renfrogne et baisse la tête d'un air buté.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Geister sagen mir etwas anderes. Ich habe die Runen gedeutet, und sie haben mir befohlen, dem Geräusch der Baleful Howl zu folgen. Jeder von uns trägt die Last des für ihn gewebten Schicksals, und meine Schicksalsfäden haben sich um meine Kehle gelegt, ersticken mich, hindern mich daran, Euch zu begleiten." {n}Ulfar runzelt die Stirn und senkt stur den Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The spirits tell me otherwise. I cast the runes, and they bade me follow the sound of the Baleful Howl. Each of us bears the burden of the fate woven for him, and mine is now coiled around my throat, choking me, keeping me from going with you." {n}Ulfar frowns, bowing his head stubbornly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Geister sagen mir etwas anderes. Ich habe die Runen gedeutet, und sie haben mir befohlen, dem Geräusch der Baleful Howl zu folgen. Jeder von uns trägt die Last des für ihn gewebten Schicksals, und meine Schicksalsfäden haben sich um meine Kehle gelegt, ersticken mich, hindern mich daran, Euch zu begleiten." {n}Ulfar runzelt die Stirn und senkt stur den Kopf.{/n}

languages.text: «No es eso lo que me dicen los espíritus. He tirado las runas y me instan a seguir el sonido del Aullido Torvo. Cada uno tiene un destino tejido, y yo llevo el mío atado al cuello como una soga que me ahoga y me impide seguirle». {n}Ulfar, testarudo, frunce el ceño y agacha la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The spirits tell me otherwise. I cast the runes, and they bade me follow the sound of the Baleful Howl. Each of us bears the burden of the fate woven for him, and mine is now coiled around my throat, choking me, keeping me from going with you." {n}Ulfar frowns, bowing his head stubbornly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No es eso lo que me dicen los espíritus. He tirado las runas y me instan a seguir el sonido del Aullido Torvo. Cada uno tiene un destino tejido, y yo llevo el mío atado al cuello como una soga que me ahoga y me impide seguirle». {n}Ulfar, testarudo, frunce el ceño y agacha la cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: 「精霊たちは、そうではないと教えてくれた。私がルーンを唱え、彼らは破滅の咆哮の音に従うよう命じられている。我々は一人ひとり彼のために織り成された運命を背負っており、今でもそれは私の喉に巻き付き、締め付け、あなたと一緒に行くことを防いでいる」{n}ウルファーは顔をしかめ、頑なに頭を下げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The spirits tell me otherwise. I cast the runes, and they bade me follow the sound of the Baleful Howl. Each of us bears the burden of the fate woven for him, and mine is now coiled around my throat, choking me, keeping me from going with you." {n}Ulfar frowns, bowing his head stubbornly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「精霊たちは、そうではないと教えてくれた。私がルーンを唱え、彼らは破滅の咆哮の音に従うよう命じられている。我々は一人ひとり彼のために織り成された運命を背負っており、今でもそれは私の喉に巻き付き、締め付け、あなたと一緒に行くことを防いでいる」{n}ウルファーは顔をしかめ、頑なに頭を下げる。{/n}

languages.text: “但那些灵魂却有别的想法。我颂唱了符文，符文要求我追随怒嚎者狼群的声音。我们每个人都背负着命运的重担，而我的命运此刻正缠绕在我的喉咙上，让我无法呼吸，让我无法与你同行。”{n}乌尔法皱着眉，固执地低下了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The spirits tell me otherwise. I cast the runes, and they bade me follow the sound of the Baleful Howl. Each of us bears the burden of the fate woven for him, and mine is now coiled around my throat, choking me, keeping me from going with you." {n}Ulfar frowns, bowing his head stubbornly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “但那些灵魂却有别的想法。我颂唱了符文，符文要求我追随怒嚎者狼群的声音。我们每个人都背负着命运的重担，而我的命运此刻正缠绕在我的喉咙上，让我无法呼吸，让我无法与你同行。”{n}乌尔法皱着眉，固执地低下了头。{/n}

languages.text: "Ruhlar bana öyle demiyor. Rünleri okudum: Uğursuz Uluma'nın sesini takip etmemi buyurdular. Her birimizin kendisine düşen yazgının yükünü sırtlanması gerekir. Bana düşen de artık boğazıma sarılmış, nefesimi kesip sana eşlik etmeme engel oluyor." {n}Ulfar kaşlarını çatıp inatla başını eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The spirits tell me otherwise. I cast the runes, and they bade me follow the sound of the Baleful Howl. Each of us bears the burden of the fate woven for him, and mine is now coiled around my throat, choking me, keeping me from going with you." {n}Ulfar frowns, bowing his head stubbornly.{/n}
